All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BParkServer
BParkServer handles client messages and interacts with the database.
ClientInfo
Represents metadata about a connected client, including IP address, hostname, status, and a unique identifier.
DBConnection
Singleton class that manages a simple database connection pool.
DBController
DBController handles database connectivity and operations related to user authentication, subscribers, reservations, and parking space management.
EmailUtil
Utility class for sending emails using JavaMail API.
MonthlyReportScheduler
Handles scheduling of monthly report generation tasks in the background.
ServerGUI
Main application launcher for the Server GUI.
ServerMainController
Main controller for the server-side GUI.
